LanguageData.CraftingSpot.label: crafting spot
LanguageData.CraftingSpot.description: A place for crafting simple things like shivs or bows.
LanguageData.NutrientPasteDispenser.label: ravinnetahna-annostelija
LanguageData.NutrientPasteDispenser.description: Tekee orgaaniseista raaka-aineista synteettista ravinnetahnaa. Accepts raw food, but not rough plant matter like hay.
LanguageData.Hopper.label: suppilo
LanguageData.Hopper.description: Varaa resursseja koneiden, kuten ravinnetahnan jakajan, käyttöön.
LanguageData.TableButcher.label: teurastuspöytä
LanguageData.TableButcher.description: Raskas pöytä kuolleiden olioiden teurastamiseen raaoiksi lihanpalasiksi.
LanguageData.ElectricTailoringBench.label: electric tailoring bench
LanguageData.ElectricTailoringBench.description: A workbench with a sewing machine for rapid tailoring of clothes. Can work without electricity at 40% of normal speed.
LanguageData.HandTailoringBench.label: hand-tailoring bench
LanguageData.HandTailoringBench.description: A workbench for tailoring clothes by hand. Works at 40% of the speed of an electric tailoring bench.
LanguageData.ElectricSmithy.label: electric smithy
LanguageData.ElectricSmithy.description: An electric-powered station equipped for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
LanguageData.FueledSmithy.label: fueled smithy
LanguageData.FueledSmithy.description: A wood-fueled station equipped for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.
LanguageData.TableSculpting.label: veistäjän pöytä
LanguageData.TableMachining.label: koneiden työstöpöytä
LanguageData.TableMachining.description: Pöytä ja työkalut koneiden osien kokoamiseen ja purkamiseen.
LanguageData.ElectricStove.label: electric stove
LanguageData.ElectricStove.description: An electrically-powered stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.
LanguageData.FueledStove.label: fueled stove
LanguageData.FueledStove.description: A simple wood-fueled stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.
LanguageData.TableStonecutter.label: kivenleikkajan pöytä
LanguageData.TableStonecutter.description: Työpöytä karkeiden kivien leikkaamiseen käyttökelpoisiksi harkoiksi.
LanguageData.Brewery.label: panimo
LanguageData.Brewery.description: Työasema kaikilla työkaluilla jotka tarvitaan oluen panemiseen.
LanguageData.ElectricSmelter.label: sähköinen sulatusuuni
LanguageData.ElectricSmelter.description: Tekee käyttökelpoista metallia kuonapaloista ja muista sekalaisista metalliesineistä. Kuluttaa paljon virtaa.
LanguageData.ComponentAssemblyBench.label: component assembly bench
LanguageData.ComponentAssemblyBench.description: A workbench equipped with advanced tools for producing components from simpler materials.
LanguageData.SimpleResearchBench.label: simple research bench
LanguageData.SimpleResearchBench.description: A simple bench with writing implements and low-tech scientific tools. Researchers work here to discover new things.
LanguageData.HiTechResearchBench.label: hi-tech research bench
LanguageData.HiTechResearchBench.description: A high-tech bench with computers and electronic measurement equipment. Research is sped up by the high-tech tools. Requires power.
LanguageData.ElectricCrematorium.label: electric crematorium
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin.label: vesiviljelyallas
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin.description: Ruokakasvien kasvattamiseen. Vesiviljelyaltaat kasvattavat muutaman kasvin nopeasti.
